StepDescription.StepDes: Login in TEST - ME rep portal site and open Participant search page
Login in TEST - ME rep portal site and open Participant search page
Search Participant
Search Participant
Login in ME Prep portal site and open Consumer search page
Login in ME Prep portal site and open Consumer search page
Click on 'Consumer Search' link
Enter Consumer last name and click on Search button
Verify Consumer data should display for Consumer last name.
Click the 'Service Plans' link and open Budget Summary page
Verify Budget Summary line is for the correct consumer and id number
Check Budget List Title
Click on 'Budget Detail ' button
Go to Service Budget Detail screen
Verify Service Budget Detail screen is for the correct consumer and id number:consumer name and id display correctly.
Verify Service Budget summary fields display Should display Total Referrals, Total Spent, Total ReferralsBalance Start Date, End Date
Verify three active icons ,These should be New Service Referral, Back to Budgets, Back to Consumer Profile

test-suite.Int_Description: Search a provider depending on different conditions about selection.

StepDescription.StepDes: Login in ME rep portal site and open Participant search page
Login in ME rep portal site and open Participant search page
Click on 'Provider Search' tab
Enter 'Provider Agency name' and click on 'Search' button on 'Vendor/Provider Search' page
Verity Provider data should display for 'Agency name'
Click on 'Provider Search' tab
Enter 'Provider Last name' and click on 'Search' button on 'Vendor/Provider Search' page
Verity Provider data should display for 'Last name'
Click on 'Provider Search' tab
Enter 'Provider First name' and click on 'Search' button on 'Vendor/Provider Search' page
Verity Provider data should display for 'First name'
Click on 'Provider Search' tab
Enter 'Provider ID' and click on 'Search' button on 'Vendor/Provider Search' page
Verity Provider data should display for 'Provider ID'
Click on 'Provider Search' tab
don't enter any information and click on 'Search' button on 'Vendor/Provider Search' page
Verity all Provider data display
Login in ME DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Login in ME DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Click on 'Support Tickets' link
Check go to Support Tickets page
Click on 'All' button, enter all information and click on 'Filter' button
Verify all Support Tickets data should display
Click on 'Support Tickets' link
Check go to Support Tickets page
Click on 'All' button, enter all information and click on 'Filter' button
Verify all Support Tickets data should display
Login in ME DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Login in ME DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Click on 'Support Tickets' link
Check go to Support Tickets page
Click on 'Close' button, Don't enter any information and click on 'Filter' button
Verify all Close Support Tickets data should display
Login in ME DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Login in ME DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Click on 'Support Tickets' link
Check go to Support Tickets page
click on 'Filter' button
Verify all Open Support Tickets data should display

test-suite.Int_Description: Search Providers in the 'Associate Providers to Participant' page successful.

StepDescription.StepDes: Login in ME DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Login in ME DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Enter 'Participant Last name' and click on 'Search' button
Verify Participant data should display for Participant last name
Click on 'Participant Profile' link
Check 'Participant Profile' page shall display.
Click on 'Associated Providers' button
Check 'Participant Associate Providers' page shall display.
Enter 'Provider ID' ,' Provider Last Name' and click on 'Search' button in 'Participant Associate Provider' page.
Verify Provider data should display for Provider First Name
Login in ME DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Login in ME DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Enter 'Participant Last name' and click on 'Search' button
Verify Participant data should display for Participant last name
Click on 'Participant Profile' link
Check 'Participant Profile' page shall display.
Click on 'Associated Providers' button
Check 'Participant Associate Providers' page shall display.
Login in ME DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Login in ME DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Enter 'Participant Last name' and click on 'Search' button
Verify Participant data should display for Participant last name
Click on 'Participant Profile' link
Check 'Participant Profile' page shall display.
Click on 'Checklist' button
Check 'Checklist' page shall display.
click on 'Cancel' button in 'Checklist' page.
Verify checklist saved sucessfully
Login in WA DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Login in WA DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Click the 'Invoice' link and open Invoice search page
Enter Invoice search criteria and click on 'Search' button
Verify Invoice search performed according to entered criteria.
Click the 'Invoice ID' link and open View Invoice page
Login in WA DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Login in WA DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Click 'Timesheets' link and open the Search Timesheets page
Search Timesheet which status is Submitted or Approved with all right data,verify a table of Timesheet shall display
Click the 'View' button in the searched table and open View Timesheet page
Click the 'Show printable version (PDF)' button and open a download dialog box
Click 'Timesheets' link and open the Search Timesheets page
Search Timesheet which status is All verify all Timesheet shall display
Login in WA DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Login in WA DSHS Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Click 'Timesheet List' link and open the Search Timesheet List page
Search Timesheet with all right data,verify a table of Timesheet shall display
Click the 'View' button in the searched table and open View Timesheet page
Click the 'Show printable version (PDF)' button and open a download dialog box
Click 'Timesheet List' link and open the Search Timesheet List page
Don't enter any information of Timesheet,verify Timesheet shall all display
Login in ME Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Login in ME Prep portal site and open Participant search page
Click on 'Manage Users' tab
Enter search criteria and click on 'Search' button on 'Manage Users' page
Verity Provider data should display for 'Agency name'
